artwork.creator: Pieter Claesz
artwork.title: Still life with a glass of beer and smoked herring on a plate
artwork.currentLocation: Museum Boijmans van Beuningen [Rotterdam, The Netherlands]
artwork.subject: Food
artwork.label: This panel is a masterpiece from Pieter Claesz' monochrome period. The soft light and finely tuned colour palette in this balanced composition produces an atmosphere of calm. With its great simplicity, with only a single glass of beer, a knife, a herring, a bread and the cracked shell of a single hazelnut, this panel sings the praises of 'our daily bread'. (Boijmans)
